text: My team leader challenged me to kill myselfIm posting this in r army also  So im in the army right  Ive only been in   months as a  b  I got to my duty station   months ago at FT Wainwright  After getting to my unit I received the normal smokings hazings of being a new infantry private  I understood it and it only lasted about a week  But this one E  im an E  decided that smoking me everyday for no reason was the right way to indoctrinate a new member of the team  Getting treated like a piece of shit for no other reason than being new took a toll on me  I started having depression about  ish months ago and it built up to me overdosing on feb  th on proprananol  I was prescribed proprananol for my hyperactive thyroid which is another story  So i overdosed  th got sent down to Joint base elmendorf richardson to be a patient at the bhu  Spent a week there  It really helped i was happier than ive ever been in the army  Mostly because I was away from the toxic enviroment  I got back here yesterday night  Today my Team leader and i were talking and he said he did not believe i took all the pills and that i only took some of them just to get attention  And he then said why would you not just use a gun and proceeded to imply i was a pussy for not using that method  Then babbled off how people in my platoon have gone through much tougher things which I agree with  I guess im just weak  And i asked him then if he was challenging me to kill myself which he didnt say anything and we proceeded to sit in awkward silence  I would just like to hear what you have to say on the situation im not looking to get him in trouble he PCS s in a month anyways  And even though ive only been back for a day i can tell im going to slip back into a depression quickly  My mother and my sister is coming up here on the  th so ill try to hold off until then

text: I need to get this off my chest  Please delete if not allowed So  I guess I should start this off by saying that my name is Blayne  and I m about   and  ish pounds  and   Now  almost all my life I ve hated being bigger than most people  I wouldn t say I m fat but I m not skinny in any way  I used to be even bigger though  and I ve lost weight but it s just not enough  There are times where I hate my own body and I feel gross  I tell myself I ll never lose this weight  and now I believe it  I ve tried  dieting  fasting  mild exercising  even making myself vomit  and even starving myself for weeks  just to lose this weight  I hate my own body so much  I ve been doing online school for three years now so that doesn t help  I never have had any limits on food growing up  if I wanted candy or soda all I had to was just go grab some  That is one thing I do not like  Thankfully  I have decent self control and have been able to maintain a rather healthy weight  But I just need to be skinny  I know many would tell me it s okay to not be skinny  Or that it I should be happy with my body  But it only makes me mad when people tell me I m normal and I m not fat or even chubby  but I know I am  Those people just want to be polite and make me feel better but I hate it so much  I could never tell my mother about this because I m sure we all know how parents tend to overreact  I just want something that will help me  I ve literally been trying to figure out how to obtain an eating disorder  just so I ll be skinny  I m sorry if this post is depressing  I just need to let it off my chest  If anyone knows anything that could possibly help don t hesitate to tell me  Thanks
